select count(*) from styletab

select s_seq,s_title,s_contents,s_writer,s_viewcount,s_writingtime, s_image1 as imagename1, s_image2 as imagename2, s_image2 as imagename2, s_image3 as imagename3, s_like from styletab order by s_like desc limit #{limit}, 16
